text: @GOPLeader The Trump administration dithered for 2 months from mid-January to mid-March and downplayed the spreading COVID19 virus. They erroneously "hoped" it would go away like the flu with the warm weather, but novel viruses don't act like the flu. They spread until they can't spread.
